div.p: After all material for the 29c3 contest did arrive and time is up, it is now on you, the I2P users, to vote for the best design. Have a look on the designs on http://echelon.i2p/29c3/ and vote! Disclaimer: all material were sent in by non I2P-team members! The I2P team is not responsible for these designs!

Thanks to the work of zzz and the help of many testers during the month-long "hackfest", we've got the first new Syndie release in nearly 6 years! Syndie 1.103b is now available for download from syndie-project.i2p, syndie-project.org, and the I2P PPA. Additionally, I2P-hosted torrents are also available If you wanted to try Syndie but were intimidated to build it yourself from source (or you previously tried it and you were frustrated by bugs) give this new version a try!
Note: A full-time maintainer is still sought. Please get in touch if you can help!
